response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high quality, I estimate its value to be well above $12,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $15,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
